source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_00<tab>Gaetelle looks at you with bright eyes.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_00<tab>宝杖通りのガエテルは、冒険者を尊敬のまなざしで見つめている。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_01<tab>Gaetelle expresses hope that you will come visit the scholasticate. She bids you and Mathye farewell before taking her leave to return to the cathedral.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_01<tab>ガエテルから、聖アンダリム神学院の学院長と面会するよう依頼された。ガエテルに学長へ取次いでもらうため、上層の聖レマノー大聖堂にいる「神学院の司祭」と話し、聖アンダリム神学院へ入ろう。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_02<tab>Upon approaching the scholasticate, the lector standing at the doors recognizes you, mentioning that Gaetelle was hopeful you would come and visit. Pass through and seek her out.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_02<tab>神学院の司祭と話し、聖アンダリム神学院へ入った。聖アンダリム神学院の「ガエテル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_03<tab>You enter the humble seminary and speak with Gaetelle about meeting with the headmistress, only to find that she is absent. Instead, Bruvagnon introduces himself as the deputy headmaster, before you are interrupted by none other than Consulting Inspector Briardien, his nephew. The good inspector has been summoned to investigate the theft of the new head of the statue of Saint Valeroyant. For old times' sake, Briardien asks Bruvagnon if you can accompany him as his associate in the case. Bruvagnon seems reluctant for you to be “associated” with the scholasticate, but eventually acquiesces. Join Briardien in his search for the student responsible for supervising the statue work.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_03<tab>ガエテルのもとを訪れたところ、学院長は不在だった。代わりに、ブリアルディアンとともに石像盗難事件の捜査にあたることになった。聖アンダリム神学院の「修復作業にあたっていた神学生」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_04<tab>The student overseeing the statue's restoration happens to be Theomocent, the student whom you rescued in the Brume. After being questioned by Briardien, he grows skittish and abruptly takes his leave to search for the missing piece on his own. Judging his conduct to be odd, Briardien concludes that the boy is hiding something. While he conducts his own investigation in the Brume, he asks that you search Saint Valeroyant's Forum in Foundation for anyone suspicious, as he believes the thief may be drawn to the broken statue.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_04<tab>修復作業にあたっていたのは、テオモサンだった。彼は、事件の責任を取るため、石像の頭部を探しにいってしまった。イシュガルドの下層の「テオモサン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_05<tab>In the forum, you find Theomocent pleading with Ben to return the crate containing the head of the statue. In response, Ben angrily accuses Theomocent of accepting the lies of the Holy See in order to have a better life. Leigh soon appears and realizing he is outnumbered, Ben yields the crate and escapes. However, Theomocent seems distraught as he ponders the words of his childhood friend. But he is soon inspired by your courage, and resolves to do his part to redeem the teachings of Halone. The two boys take their leave to return to the scholasticate with the crate.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_05<tab>テオモサンと話した。窃盗犯に正教の欺瞞を糾弾され、心揺らぐテオモサンだったが、冒険者の導きによって、聖職者となることで正教の罪を贖うと決意した。聖アンダリム神学院の「ブリュヴァニョン副学長」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_06<tab>You return to the scholasticate and see Theomocent and Leigh, who have already returned the statue piece and explained what happened, leaving out the details of who had stolen it. Briardien asks after the culprit, but before you can reply, one of the highborn students, Archombadin, interrupts, claiming to have witnessed Theomocent and Leigh conspiring with another lowborn friend to steal the statue piece and return it to curry favor. Leigh denies the accusation, asserting that you were there and can vouch for their innocence, but Bruvagnon dismisses the students, putting an end to the discussion.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_06<tab>ブリュヴァニョン副学長に報告した。石像盗難事件は解決をみたが、学院内には問題が山積しているようだ。「ブリュヴァニョン副学長」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_07<tab>Bruvagnon commends your assistance in resolving the incident and allows you to further accompany Briardien in his work in the scholasticate. However, pointing out the basic level of investigative skill that was necessary to resolve the incident, the inspector remarks that the theft was merely a way to present a more serious problem. He asks his uncle to explain the real reason why his services were requested.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SEQ_07<tab>ブリュヴァニョン副学長と話した。功績が認められ、冒険者も正式に神学院の顧問に指名された。顧問の招聘の背景には、隠された目的があるようだ……。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the scholasticate lector.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_TODO_00<tab>神学院の司祭と話す

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Gaetelle.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_TODO_01<tab>聖アンダリム神学院のガエテルと話す

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_TODO_02<tab>Seek out the student in charge of the statue's restoration.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_TODO_02<tab>修復作業にあたった神学生と話す

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_TODO_03<tab>Search for suspects in Saint Valeroyant's Forum.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_TODO_03<tab>下層のテオモサンと話す

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_TODO_04<tab>Report to Bruvagnon.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_TODO_04<tab>聖アンダリム神学院のブリュヴァニョン副学長に報告

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Bruvagnon.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_TODO_05<tab>ブリュヴァニョン副学長と話す

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_000<tab>I must take my leave and return to the cathedral. Mathye, it has been a pleasure. <var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, I sincerely hope you shall consider my offer to meet with the headmistress. Halone's blessings be upon you both.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_000それでは、)) (( )) 02 /var>様。
ご都合のよろしいときに「聖アンダリム神学院」をお訪ねください。
聖レマノー大聖堂にいる「神学院の司祭」が学院に案内いたします。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_009<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>! It seems Halone has answered my prayer that you would visit our halls.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_009これは、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
来てくださったのですね！
心を込めて、貴方の冒険の幸を祈念しておきました。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_MATHYE_000_009<tab>Oh, my face must be red as a beet at this moment. Well, um, let me know if you ever feel a burning need to help out again? When you have the time, of course!
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_MATHYE_000_009学院長は多忙ゆえに、面会など滅多にかないません。
やはり英雄様となると、待遇が違いますね。
うらやましいかぎりです。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SCHOLASTICATELECTOR_000_005<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, yes? Sister Gaetelle was hopeful you would come and visit. She awaits you inside.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_SCHOLASTICATELECTOR_000_005あなたが、)) (( )) 02 /var>様ですね？
ご足労いただき、ありがとうございます。
どうぞ、こちらへ。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_Q1_000_010<tab>Enter Saint Endalim's Scholasticate?
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_Q1_000_010<tab>「聖アンダリム神学院」に移動しますか？

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_A1_000_011<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_A1_000_011<tab>はい

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_A1_000_012<tab>No
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_A1_000_012<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_010<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, welcome to the scholasticate! I appreciate you coming all this way, but I am afraid the headmistress is not here at the moment. She has taken leave to rest. Forgive me, but I must ask you to meet with her another day...
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_010これは、英雄)) (( )) 02 /var>様……！
ご足労いただき申し訳ないのですが、
学院長とのお話は、日を改めていただかねばならなくなりました。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_011<tab>It truly is a pity, as I too was looking forward to her audience with you. Allow me to formally introduce myself─I am Father Bruvagnon. I have heard much about you from Sister Gaetelle.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_011私は、副学長ブリュヴァニョンです。
ガエテルから話を伺いました。
私からも、感謝の意を示させていただきます。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_012<tab>In the headmistress's absence, I have been charged with tending to myriad administrative matters. While that would ordinarily constitute as simply waxing the seal to a pile of parchments, I have been forced to take a more hands-on approach.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_012……ですが、学院長が不在の上に、予期せぬ事件が発生しまして、
その対応に追われている状況なのです。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_013<tab>The deputy headmaster and I were just discussing a rather troubling event which occurred soon after our students' encounter in the Brume, and we fear it may be connected.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_013こちらの都合で、無駄足を踏ませてしまったのですから、
事情を説明せねばなりませんね……。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_014<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, you are familiar with the statue of Saint Valeroyant? The one in the center of the forum? House Dzemael's stonemasons have been working on chiseling a new head, and one of our students has been tasked with overseeing their work.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_014)) (( )) 02 /var>さんは、
「聖バルロアイアン像」をご存知ですか？
ええ、下層の広場にある頭部が欠けた竜騎士像です。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_015<tab>Unfortunately, this student has since reported that the piece has vanished from the artisans' workshop. Given that it has little monetary value, Father Bruvagnon and I cannot help but wonder if─
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_015かの石像の頭部を、奉仕活動の一環として、
神学生たちの手で修復していたのですが……
これが何者かによって、盗まれてしまったのですよ。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_016<tab>If the culprit bears a grudge towards this student? Briardien, consulting inspector, at your service.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_016そして、このぼくが、その盗難事件捜査の依頼を請け負った……
神学院の臨時顧問、兼、事件屋のブリアルディアンだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_017<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? What brings you here of all places? Ah, don't tell me. <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> were the “hero” that the students have been murmuring about. I cannot say I am surprised.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_017なっ！　なんと、こんなところで再会するとは！
話に聞いた神学生の恩人とは、君だったか！？

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_018<tab>You are acquainted with my nephew, <var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>?
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_018おや……
我が甥、ブリアルディアンと知り合いであったのですか？

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_019<tab>Yes, mine uncle. You could say our paths have crossed. More than once.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_019ええ、叔父上、この)) (( )) 02 /var>とは、
以前にとある事件の捜査で協力したことがあってね。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_020<tab>An idea occurs to me. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> is an adventurer of exceptional skill, in combat and deduction both. Pray, allow me to appoint <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> as my assistant─no, <var 1A 02 /var>associate<var 1A 01 /var>, in my work here at the scholasticate.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_020そうだ！
叔父上、は、非常に優秀な冒険者だ。
ぼくの助手……特別顧問として迎えたいが、いかがだろう。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_021<tab>A prolonged association is like to raise more than a few eyebrows, if not invite criticism.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_021……むぅ、神学院の危機を打破するために、
すでに、無理を押してお前を招聘している。
さらなる部外者を神学院に関わらせるわけには……。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_022<tab>While I understand your concern, I am willing to trust Briardien's judgment. <var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> has shown nothing but compassion towards our students.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_022副学長、私はブリアルディアン殿に賛成です。
英雄様は善意で、生徒に救いの手を差し伸べてくださいました。
そのような人物こそ、信頼に足るといえましょう。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_023<tab>At least permit me <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> company in ascertaining the piece's whereabouts. You may judge the value of our association afterwards.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_023……正式な顧問として招くかどうかはともかく、
石像盗難事件の解決に、力を借りるのは問題ないでしょう？
その後については、実績をもって判断すればいい。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_024<tab>...Very well. But no one is to speak of this to the headmistress. I will allow <var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> to accompany you, but only for the duration of the investigation. And for the love of the Fury, be discreet.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_024よかろう、学院長がお戻りになるまでに、
石像盗難事件は解決しておきたいからな……。
では、改めて私からも、助力を依頼させていただきたい。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_025<tab>Excellent. Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Our first course of action will be to question the student responsible for overseeing the statue's restoration.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_025なりゆきで巻き込んでしまったが、
事件の捜査解決には、腕利きの助力が必要だったものでね。
さっそく、修復作業にあたっていた神学生の話を聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_029<tab>Hm. Soot and white pumice dust. We have our boy.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_029<tab>彼が「聖バルロアイアン像」の修復にあたっていたそうだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_029<tab>I pray the Fury will give you the speed to solve this conundrum before the headmistress returns.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_029<tab>学院長が戻るまでに、事件が解決することを期待しています。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_029<tab>Your friendship with Briardien may be a blessing in disguise. I hope you will find the missing piece soon.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_GAETELLE_000_029ブリアルディアン殿と旧知の仲であったとは、
なんという神のおぼしめし……。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_030<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>! A pleasant surprise to see you once more. Praise be to Halone.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_030)) (( )) 02 /var>さん……。
この再会を、戦神ハルオーネに感謝いたします。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_031<tab>...So you are asking after the statue piece. I made sure to lock the workshop door, so I don't understand how it could have been taken. But worry not! I take full responsibility and will personally see it returned.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_031……なるほど、貴方も石像の件でいらっしゃったのですか。
今回の盗難は、頭部を作業場に放置した僕の責任です。
必ず、僕が見つけ出します……！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_032<tab>That won't be necessary. Inspector Briardien, at your service. I am told you were recently harassed by several ruffians in the Brume, and I suspect they may be responsible for this theft. What can you tell me about these men?
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_032事件の捜査は、我々に任せるがいい。
素人に現場を荒らされるのは、懲り懲りなものでね。
それに、確か君は、暴漢に襲われたばかりなのだろう？

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_033<tab>N-Nothing, Inspector! I had never seen them before in my life! A-And besides, why would they want to steal the statue piece? It makes no sense! In any event, as I said, the responsibility is mine and mine alone. N-Now, if you would excuse me.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_033いえ、それでは神が僕をお許しになりません！！
やはり僕の過ちは、我が身で償わなければ……！！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_034<tab>Hmph. Admirable sense of responsibility notwithstanding, he's clearly hiding something.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_034やれやれ、信心深いのも結構だが、
ほどほどにしてもらいたいものだ。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_035<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I think we may find our answers in Foundation. While I make inquiries in the Brume, I ask that you keep an eye on the forum. Many miscreants are wont to delight in their misdeeds, and this one may be drawn to the statue.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_035新たに事件を増やされたのでは、たまらない。
言って聞かない奴は、手元に置いておくしかないか……。
ひとまず手分けして、下層に向かったであろう彼を探そう。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BEN_000_039<tab>You again!? I told you not to meddle in my affairs. Away with you!
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BEN_000_039くっ、またアンタか……！？
面倒事に巻き込まれたくなけりゃ、去りな！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_040<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, how did you...? <sigh> I suppose I should be honest with you. I am certain the stolen piece is in that crate. I know you are helping the inspector, but I beg you, let me try to reason with Ben first.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_040)) (( )) 02 /var>さん……！？
どうやらあの箱に、石像の頭部が入っている様子……。
でも少しお待ちください、ベンが改心するのを信じたいんです。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_041<tab>Ben, please return the statue piece and all shall be forgiven. You do understand the consequences of what you are doing? Defiling a saint's monument is a serious crime!
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_041ベン……。
どうか、その木箱をお返しください。
中身が「聖バルロアイアン像」の頭部だと、知っているのでしょう？

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_042<tab>When Father Choisseau read us stories at the orphanage, you loved the ones about Saint Valeroyant. Do you not wish to see the statue restored?
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_042思い出してください……！
ショワソー司祭は、いつも僕たちに聖人の話をしてくれました。
ベンだって、竜騎士の聖バルロアイアン様に憧れていたはず……。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BEN_000_043<tab>Saint Valeroyant. An Azure Dragoon who drew the great wyrm away from Ishgard. For all we know, that too was a lie.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BEN_000_043ああ、確かに憧れてたよ……。
悪いドラゴンを、さっそうと倒す蒼の竜騎士だもんな。
だけど、その伝説だって、どうせデタラメだったんだろう！？

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BEN_000_044<tab>The Holy See and the bloody highborn deceived us, Theo! They built their fortunes on our backs! But you...you would willingly believe those lies if it meant a chance at a better life for yourself!
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BEN_000_044聖職者や貴族たちが、ドラゴン族との戦いに、
平民を投げ込むためにでっちあげた真っ赤な大ウソだろ！！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_045<tab>I knew you were the one behind this! You've been following Theo and me ever since we met in the Brume!
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_045見つけたぞ、ベン！　やっぱ、お前の仕業だったか！
テオがお前に石像のことを話したって言ってたから、
ピンときたんだ！！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_046<tab>Be careful, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! He's not going to give it up without a fight!
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_046なあ、あんたも手伝ってくれ！
この愚かな幼馴染が、今すぐ石像を返却するように！！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_047<tab>W-Wait, all of you! I still believe Ben will do what's right!
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_047わ、わ、わ。
ふたりとも、もう少し……もう少しだけお待ちください！
僕は、ベンが過ちを悔い改めることを信じます！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BEN_000_048<tab>There you go again, turning up your nose and spewing shite as if you're one of <var 1A 02 /var>them<var 1A 01 /var>. Don't you see? I <var 1A 02 /var>am<var 1A 01 /var> doing what's right! I'm ridding us of these false heroes!
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BEN_000_048……過ちだと！？
そうやって神の名を騙って俺たちからすべてを奪い続けた、
お前らの方が、よっぽど罪深いだろうが！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BEN_000_049<tab>Bah! Keep your bloody head, and your library and lessons filled with lies. Believe them if you want─you're just as bad as the rest!
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BEN_000_049だから俺たちは、正教に復讐を始めたんだ！
それでも、まだお前らは……坊主を目指すってのか！？

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_050<tab>He...he is right to be angry. I dreamt of teaching our people to walk in Halone's grace. But when the scripture itself has been called into question, how am I to find my own way?
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_050……正教は、偽りの歴史を広める罪を犯しました。
ですが、孤児の僕たちを育ててくれたのも、
正教の司祭様です……。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_051<tab>Whatever should I do...?
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_051)) (( )) 02 /var>さん……。
僕は、どうしたらいいんでしょう……？

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_A1_000_001<tab>Forge your own path.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_A1_000_001<tab>自分で決めろ

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_052<tab>My own path? You mean...interpret the scripture on my own? A different approach to our faith, to be sure...but mayhap you have the right of it.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_052ありがとうございます、おかげで確信できました。
僕を導くために、神が貴方をお遣わしになったんですね。
そうです、これは自分で決めねばならない問題です！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_053<tab>I suppose there is no simple answer. Yet when I look at you, I see one who has walked <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> own path, no matter how perilous. I envy that courage...
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_053……そうですよね。
僕の進むべき道は、僕が決めなければなりませんよね……！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_054<tab>Mayhap the answer to my question is writ not in ink nor carved in stone, but in the strength of mine own conviction.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_054ありがとうございます、おかげで確信できました。
きっと僕を導くために、神が貴方をお遣わしになったんですね。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_055<tab>Forgive me, Ben, but I have come too far to give up now. If Halone's teachings have been distorted by man's hand, then by man's hand must they be redeemed.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_055ごめんなさい、ベン……。
やっぱり僕は……聖職者を目指します。
正教の罪をあがない、そして多くの人々の魂を救うために……。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_056<tab>That's all well and good, but we won't change Ishgard by standing around in the snow. At least Ben left us the statue piece. We'd best return it before that prized peacock starts squawking to the deputy headmaster.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_056ああ、この道を選んだ以上、つき進むしかないんだ。
さあ……石像を神学院に戻そうぜ。
急がないと、また貴族組にイヤミを言われるぞ！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_057<tab>Will you come too, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I'm sure he will appreciate your help in retrieving it.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_057また、あんたに助けてもらったな。
ついでに神学院の副学長のところまで来てくれないか？
場合によっては、俺たちの身がヤバくなりそうだからさ……。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_059<tab>I see you found the boy and the missing statue piece. Care to share with us the details?
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_059やれやれ、ぼくよりも先にテオモサンを見つけたばかりか、
事件を解決して帰ってくるとはな。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_059<tab>Well, that is that. All's well that ends well, yes?
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_059)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
ちょうど副学長に、貴方のご協力を報告していたんですよ。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_059<tab>(Theo already explained everything. We recovered the statue piece, and that's what matters.)
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_059来てくれたのか、ありがとよ。
あんたからも副学長に報告してくれないか？
ただ……ベンのことは伏せてやってほしい。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_060<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, I see you've returned as well. Leigh and Theomocent have just finished explaining to me what happened. I thank you for your help in resolving this matter swiftly.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_060)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、戻られましたか。
貴方の助勢のおかげで、事件を解決できたと聞きました。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_061<tab>But there appears to be something missing. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, pray tell...what became of the suspect? Surely these two wish to seek justice for the theft.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_061……それで、石像を盗んだ犯人はどうした？
神学生たちは、そろいもそろって口をつぐんでいてな。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_ARCHOMBADIN_000_062<tab>(-???-)Those two will tell you naught, Inspector. For they are the culprits whom you seek.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_ARCHOMBADIN_000_062(-自信にみちた声-)ハッ、しらを切るつもりか。
学のない平民が安易に使いそうな、場しのぎの下策だな。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_ARCHOMBADIN_000_063<tab>Allow me to shed some light on this troubling situation. As a son of House Dzemael, it <var 1A 02 /var>pained<var 1A 01 /var> me to learn that our artisans' precious work had been spirited away. So I saw fit to conduct mine own investigation. I followed Leigh at a distance, only to find him and his friend consorting with the culprit!
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_ARCHOMBADIN_000_063ブリュヴァニョン様。
彼らに代わり、私アルションバダンが報告いたします。
犯人は、この2名と同じ修道院で育った平民の孤児です！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_ARCHOMBADIN_000_064<tab>Camaraderie among orphans of the Brume is to be expected. But to steal a saint's head so that they may “retrieve” it to prove their merit!
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_ARCHOMBADIN_000_064盗まれた石像を、すぐに奪還した点から推察するに、
自作自演の可能性も濃厚といえましょう。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEBRASSOIR_000_065<tab>(-Composed Student-)And such desperation that they would desecrate a tome in this manner! You would expect a seminarian to treat any holy text with the utmost care─even if they are but children's stories.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEBRASSOIR_000_065(-冷徹な声の神学生-)「点数稼ぎ」に必死ですねぇ……？
灰となった聖典も買い換えられぬほど困窮していては、
財を成すため、聖職者にならんとするのも無理からぬこと……。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_066<tab>Piss off, you priggish whoreson! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> was there! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var>'ll tell you you're wrong!
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_066黙れ……！
この方が、俺たちの無実を証明してくれる！
それとも俺が、力ずくで黙らせてやろーか！？

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_067<tab>Enough! You will <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> conduct yourselves with decorum as befits seminarians! Leigh, we will discuss penance for your foul language anon.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_067そこまでです！
神学院内での根拠なき暴言も、暴力も許しません！
今は神学院が一丸にならねばならぬ時だというのに……！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_ARCHOMBADIN_000_068<tab>Father Bruvagnon, if I may. The next time the scholasticate apportions work with the sacred monuments, pray entrust the task to me. I am certain the artisans of my house would be at ease knowing their work was in <var 1A 02 /var>cleaner<var 1A 01 /var>, more dependable hands.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_ARCHOMBADIN_000_068今後、石像などの修復に関しては、まず私にご相談を。
石造建築にかけては、皇都において、
我らゼーメル家の右に出る存在はいないのですからね。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_ARCHOMBADIN_000_069<tab>And as for my ignoble peers, if the comprehension of advanced scripture is still beyond you such that you require a tattered tome of children's lessons, then allow me to procure for you a new copy with mine own coin. You need not thank me─House Dzemael prides itself on its charity to the deprived.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_ARCHOMBADIN_000_069それから、平民組よ。
教材をそろえられぬのなら、私にすがるがいい。
ハッ、聖典の1冊程度、この私が恵んでやるぞ。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_070<tab>M-My tome, if you would! Oof!
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_070<tab>あっ、僕の聖典！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_JANCHETTE_000_071<tab>(-???-)Just how long are you planning to lie there?
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_JANCHETTE_000_071(-厳格な声の神学生-)いつまで倒れていますの？
さっさとお立ちなさい……。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_JANCHETTE_100_071<tab>You're completely hopeless.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_JANCHETTE_100_071<tab>(-厳格な声の神学生-)……目障りですわ。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_072<tab>Th-Thank you, Blaisie.
target: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_THEOMOCENT_000_072<tab>あっ、ありがとうございます。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_073<tab>Gah! This is what happens when you let him walk all over you! It'll be a miracle if we're not branded heretics by the end of this term!
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_LEIGH_000_073ああああ、むしゃくしゃする！
テオ、頭冷やしにいくぞ！

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_074<tab>Leigh, Theomocent, consider this a warning; you were saved this time solely by <var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>'s integrity and the grace of the Fury. But I will not turn a blind eye if you continue to fraternize with questionable company.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_074貴方たちが無事だったのは、英雄殿と神の賜物。
以後、無茶は控えるのですよ。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_QUIQUETIN_000_075<tab>(-???-)Ah, the insurmountable wall between the highborn and lowborn. I wonder, did our ancestors build it, brick by brick? Or was it fate which drove us apart? And where shall we go from here...
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_QUIQUETIN_000_075(-邪気に満ちた声-)貴族と平民を隔てる壁は、先祖の行いなのか、運命なのか……。
さあて、ついに聖戦がはじまるね……ウフフフ。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_079<tab>Excellent work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I had no doubts that you would rise to the challenge.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_079実に見事だった。
これで叔父上も、君をぼくの助手として認めざるをえないだろう。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_080<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, I must apologize for the behavior of my students. They have been at each other's throats since the revelations came to light. As for your performance─you have surpassed my expectations, and I will allow you to assist Briardien in his work at the scholasticate. Well done.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_080学生たちのせいで少々ごたつきましたが、
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿は、見事に事件を解決されました。
約束どおり、貴方を特別顧問として迎えさせてください。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_081<tab>If I may be so bold, Uncle. Though I have but arrived, and this is the only case you have had me investigate thus far, I must say that I found it rather a waste of my talents.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_081叔父上、その前にひとつ確認したい。
ぼくが、この神学院に赴いて数日……
気になっていることがある。

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_082<tab>While theft is indeed a serious matter, I cannot help but wonder if this was merely some pretense. Surely you have a more pressing problem?
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRIARDIEN_000_082確かに神学院をとりまく状況は厳しく、実際に被害も出ている。
しかし、ぼくを呼んだ理由は、それだけではないはずだ。
対立深まる学内の様子……こちらの方が深刻なのでは？

source: TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_083<tab>...An astute observation. I expected nothing less. There is indeed another matter I should discuss with you and your newly appointed associate.
target:
TEXT_CHREND102_02153_BRUVAGNON_000_083……さすがは我が甥、事件屋の看板に偽りないようだ。
まさしく、お前を呼び寄せた真の理由は別にある……！
